cards.title: Breach Mage
powers: Draw a card or activate a card's Cast effect and destroy that card.
Destroy 2 of your Charge cards. If you do, any player draws 4 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

cards.title: Cycle of Magic
body: Activate a card's [u]Cast[/u] text, then place that card on top of your deck.

cards.title: Focus Breach
body: Search your deck or trash for a Breach card and put it into play. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

cards.title: Open Breach
body: At the start of your turn, you may activate a card's [u]Cast[/u] text, then destroy that card.
At the end of your turn, you may play 1 Spell card.

cards.title: Potent Breach
body: At the start of your turn, you may activate a card's [u]Cast[/u] text, then destroy that card.
If that [u]Cast[/u] text deals damage, increase that damage by 1.

activatableAbilities.name: cast
activatableAbilities.text: {BreachMage} deals 1 Target 4 Lightning Damage. Reveal the top 2 cards of any deck. Put them back on top of the deck in any order.

activatableAbilities.name: cast
activatableAbilities.text: {BreachMage} deals 1 Target 3 Radiant Damage. Each player draws a card.

activatableAbilities.name: cast
activatableAbilities.text: {BreachMage} deals 1 Target 2 Psychic Damage. You may destroy an Ongoing or Environment card.

activatableAbilities.name: cast
activatableAbilities.text: {BreachMage} deals 1 Target 3 Fire Damage. You may destroy up to 3 of your Charge cards. For each card destroyed this way, {BreachMage} deals 1 Target 3 Fire Damage.

activatableAbilities.name: cast
activatableAbilities.text: {BreachMage} deals each non-Hero Target 3 Fire Damage.

cards.title: Hammer Charm
cards.body: When you play this, you may destroy an Ongoing or Environment card.

cards.title: Staff Charm
cards.body: When you play this, activate a card's [u]Cast[/u] text, then destroy that card. If that [u]Cast[/u] text deals damage, increase that damage by 2.

cards.title: Spiral Charm
cards.body: When you play this, activate a card's [u]Cast[/u] text.

cards.title: Vigor Charm
cards.body: When you play this, draw 3 cards and {BreachMage} deals themselves 2 Psychic Damage.

cards.title: Aura Charm
cards.body: When you play this, one Hero may use a power.

promoCards.title: Breach Mage
powers: Destroy 2 of your Charge cards. If you do, select a card and activate its [u]Cast[/u] text twice, then destroy that card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

promoCards.title: Breach Mage
powers: Return one of your Equipment cards to your hand. Play an Equipment card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
